From: KSLawdogg@...

Imprisoner/Predator/Choran/Koga Shuko/Ramhorn/Anubis/Hades/Unitron:



Imprisoner went flying back, slamming through a tree, not moving.


Predator ducked under the blast, firing a grenade off at Firearm's chest, two 
optic blasts streaking out at his left knee.

Choran cursed, taking out his rapid-firing laser rifle, firing off 16 rapid 
laser blasts at Rex's pelvis.

====

Koga Shuko stepped into the open, revealing Ramhorn as a hostage.  "Back off! 
 Or the Maximal gets it!" he yells.

Anubis yelps, rocks hitting him.  WIth a swipe of his hand, he knocked away 
the quills, firing off a blast from his rocket launcher at Shadow Wing, as 
well as three blue optic blasts at her left leg.

Hades yelled, a quill stabbing into his shoulder.  Raising his missile 
launcher, he fired a rocket off at Spear's abdomen.

---

Unitron entered the control room, spotting Teletran-1.  Walking up to the 
computer, he smiled.  "With the Ark in ruins, this is the last piece of 
equipment that needs be destroyed." Reaching into subspace, he took out two 
charges.  Setting both on Teletran-1.  He then too out two grenades, getting 
to the doorway, throwing them, one in the middle of Teletran-1's charges, the 
other hitting Teletran-2.  The grenade set off the charges on Teletran-1.

Unitron ran for where Koga Shuko was, chuckling.
